Base:Descriptions.Base:Description: courtyard for training

A wide training square. The square is dingy, clearly not a main thoroughfair. Scattered about the area are various implements used for the training of swordplay. Against the north wall, a series of straw-filled targets rest, clearly practice for archery. To the east, two stuffed dummies with arms outstretched sit, a tool for sword practice. And to the west is a small fenced in arena, no doubt built for pitting two live opponents against one another. Morning has broken and the first rays of sunshine can be seen shimmering down, slightly illuminating the small courtyard. The sun has risen and the hustle and bustle of the city is muted by the close walls, but still audible. The midday sun is high in the sky and waves of heat can be seen shimmering off the cobblestones. The afternoon sun does little to lighten the dingy square. The sun has set and the courtyard is deeply shadowed in the failing light. Evening has fallen and the square is nearly pitch black. There is a slight chill in the air. Midnight has struck and the silent courtyard is enveloped in total darkness. A barely noticible lightening on the overhangs above signal the coming of dawn. An opening to the south leads into a cobbled alley.
A training square.

A wide square used for training, dingy and scattered with various implements of practice for soldiers. The square is dimly lit by the day's light. The square is deeply wrapped in near pitch blackness. An opening to the south leads into a cobbled alley.
http://www.skotos.net/IronclawGame/images/maps/night/docktown/streets/dockstreet/docksquare.jpg
the southern alleyway
The southern alley heads toward Dock Street. In this direction, you can see:
fighting arena

A square to the west encircled by a single-barred wooden fence, marking off a swordplay arena for practice. Rather than cobblestones, it is floored by flattened sand to cushion falls. The fence itself is chipped and worn from countless misplaced blows, though it appears otherwise sturdy.
a swordplay arena.
A square to the west encircled by a single-barred wooden fence, marking off a swordplay arena for practice.
a cobblestone
One of a series of countless cobblestones paving the square. The stones look old and firmly embedded.
One of a series of countless cobblestones paving the courtyard.
straw dummy

One of two straw-filled dummies near the east wall. Its appearance is made to be that of a humanoid torso with a head and a horizontal pole extending to either side of the figure for arms. It has no legs, rather it rests on a thick wooden pole set to rotate in its base. On the end of each of the arms is a leather bag filled with sand, so that someone who struck a dummy would need to avoid the rotating, ingenious in its simplicity. However at the moment, they seem to be worn and broken, so they do not spin.
One of two straw-filled dummies near the east wall.
One of two straw-filled dummies shaped like a person with arms outstetched near the east wall.
wooden fence

A wooden fence surrounding an arena. It's made of a single bar of wood set on top of four posts in each of the corners of the arena. The wood is worn and pitted from the endless strikes of dull swordblades.
a wooden fence surrounding an arena.
A wooden fence surrounding an arena.
the sand floor of the arena
Packed sand laid upon the floor of the arena to cushion falls.
the sand floor of the arena
The beaten down sand floor of the arena.
archery target

One of several archery targets lining the north wall that are used for the training of archers. Its shape is circular. Painted in red across its front is a thick-lined circle midway through its diameter, and a large red dot is painted in in its center for the bullseye. The surface is made of sackcloth dyed white and is heavily pitted from the impact of countless arrows. Here and there strands of straw stick out where the stuffing has begun to break free at the seams.
One of a number of archery targets against the north wall.
One of several targets spread along the north wall that are used for archery practice.
the eastern wall

An impressive stone wall, made of thick blocks of stone settled in with age stretches upward, pitted by time and weather. The mortar, though eaten away in some places is still made strong by the sheer weight of these stones, and looks likely to continue to stand for some time to come. Two swordplay straw dummies that have seen better days stand several feet from the wall, allowing them to turn freely.

An impressive stone wall, made of thick blocks of stone settled in with age stretches upward into the darkness pitted by time and weather. Two barely discernable swordplay dummies stand several feet from this wall.

An impressive stone wall, made of thick blocks of stone settled in with age stretches upward, pitted by time and weather. Two swordplay straw dummies stand several feet from the wall, allowing them to turn freely.
An impressive stone wall, made of thick blocks of stone settled in with age. Two swordplay straw dummies stand several feet from the wall.
An impressive stone wall, made of thick blocks of stone settled in with age. Two swordplay straw dummies stand several feet from the wall.
An impressive stone wall, made of thick blocks of stone settled in with age. Two swordplay straw dummies stand several feet from the wall.
the northern wall

An impressive stone wall, made of thick blocks of stone settled in with age stretches upward, pitted by time and weather. The mortar, though eaten away in some places is still made strong by the sheer weight of these stones, and looks likely to continue to stand for some time to come. Across the front of it stand a series of dingy straw filled targets worn from countless use.

An impressive stone wall, made of thick blocks of stone settled in with age stretches upward into the darkness pitted by time and weather. Along the wall stand several straw targets, bathed in shadow so that their target lines cannot determined.
An impressive stone wall, made of thick blocks of stone settled in with age stretches upward, pitted by time and weather. Along the wall are a number of straw targets made for archery.
An impressive stone wall, made of thick blocks of stone settled in with age. A number of archery targets line this wall.
An impressive stone wall, made of thick blocks of stone settled in with age. A number of archery targets line this wall.
An impressive stone wall, made of thick blocks of stone settled in with age. A number of archery targets line this wall.
the western wall

An impressive stone wall, made of thick blocks of stone settled in with age stretches upward, pitted by time and weather. The mortar, though eaten away in some places is still made strong by the sheer weight of these stones, and looks likely to continue to stand for some time to come. Made of thick wooden beams, a small sword-fighting arena ha been constructed here for pitting live opponents against one another.
An impressive stone wall, made of thick blocks of stone settled in with age stretches upward into the darkness pitted by time and weather. A small fenced-off arena sits here.
An impressive stone wall, made of thick blocks of stone settled in with age stretches upward, pitted by time and weather. A small fenced-off arena sits here for sword-fighting bouts.
An impressive stone wall, made of thick blocks of stone settled in with age. A small fenced-off arena sits here.
An impressive stone wall, made of thick blocks of stone settled in with age. A small fenced-off arena sits here.
An impressive stone wall, made of thick blocks of stone settled in with age. A small fenced-off arena sits here.

Core:Properties.Core:Property: "\{You feel the heat rise up from the hard dry \{ground\|earth\}.\| The \{hot\|burning\|sweltering\} sun beats down on your back.\| The \{heat\|warmth\} of the sun brings out the worst \{smells\|scents\|odors\} of \{the city\|docktown\}.\}"

"\{Rain \{pours\|falls\} down from \{over head\|above\|the sky\}.\|Several lightning bolts lance down from \{over head\|above\|the sky\} striking in the distance.\| A loud clap of thunder sounds, sending vibrations through the ground, shaking you.\|\{A series of lightning\|A lightning bolt\} streaks across \{over head\|above\|the sky\} spreading out like fingers on a hand.\| Lightning emblazons the sky spreading a \{eerie\|ominous\} white glow on everything around you.\| The rain \{lightens\|calms\|weakens\} for a moment before a \{clap\|shock\|boom\} of thunder ushers it's heavy return.\| The dark clouds billow ominously \{over head\|above\|through the sky\}, sending rain falling down in waves.\| The wind blows the rain harshly \{against your face\|in your eyes\}.\|A heavy blast of rain forces you to \{close your eyes.\|turn your face\}.\}"
